name: Slimefall - LD48
description:
Gather slime from the cave, and don’t hit the ground until you’ve collected enough (see top right in game). See how deep you can go (only 4 levels )!

Controls: WASD, arrows.

Game made in the Bevy Engine with Rust. The game could probably do with a better character controller and more levels but I’m satisfied for now!

Made in 72 hours using bevy, sfxr.me  and aseprite.
